name: Mamel Adventure
description:
Help Mamel in this adventure, where she faces dangers on the way to her home in the Ice Mountains

Ajude Mamel nessa aventura, onde ela enfrenta perigos no caminho para sua casa nas Montanha Gelada.

CREDITIS / CRÉDITOS:

 - Sprites: MAMEL AND SCENES: GAME ART 2D / FOOD: VECTEEZY / MAMELS HOUSE: ZCOOL.COM.CN / BIRDS: http://bevouliin.com

- Sound Effects: FREESOUND.ORG

- Soundtrack Game Over and Start: FREESOUND.ORG

- Music Stages by Kevin Macleod - incompetch.com :

STAGE 1: PINBALL SPRING / STAGE 2: CHIPPER DOODLE 2 / STAGE 3: SAX ROCK AND ROLL / FINAL SCENE: AMBLER

Mamel Adventure was developed by Marcio Krüger Barbosa (Curicom Games). A non-commercial game. Year:2018. It was my first game developed.

MA+MEL= Marjorie + Melanie my daughters.
